meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Barbarian</kanji>s have <kanji>melon</kanji>s too, but they're long and funny looking. Wait, those aren't melons, they're <vocabulary>cucumber</vocabulary>s! Barbarians must have mixed them up.
readingMnemonic:
The reading for this word is an exception. Here's a mnemonic to help you remember it:

<vocabulary>Cucumber</vocabulary>s have <reading>cu</reading>te <reading>ri</reading>bs (きゅうり)! I mean just look at them. Cute little green ribs. Adorable!
